Advance Unit Lupicia:
This place where we're talking is safe, but the others are extremely dangerous. Only the skilled and confident can survive.
You look confident in your abilities, but I'm afraid you're not skilled enough to fight here. I recommend you come back when you are stronger. To return to Heine, talk to Frederick over there.
(This quest is for characters of Lv. 110 and higher who have completed the "Unveiled Fafurion Temple" quest.)
